game.board.construction.localities

Class Locality

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.board.construction.Construction
      • game.board.construction.localities.Locality
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    City, Settlement

    public abstract class Locality
extends Construction
    Represents a locality.
    Author:
    Yize Sun, Christoph Hermann

    • Property Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Type Property and Description
      javafx.beans.property.SimpleObjectProperty<Corner> position
      Getter for the Position Property of the Locality on the corner

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) javafx.beans.property.SimpleObjectProperty<Corner> positionProperty
      The Corner this locality is positioned on.
      (package private) int resourceMultiplier
      The multiplier used to determine the amount of Resources this locality produces.
      (package private) int victoryPoints
      The amount of victory points a Player gets for owning this locality.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Locality

        public Locality(Player player,
                Corner corner,
                int victoryPoints,
                int resourceMultiplier)
        Creates a new locality belonging to the specified Player on the given Corner.
        Parameters:
        player - the Player owning this locality.
        corner - the corner to build the Locality on.
        victoryPoints - the victory points a player gets for owning this locality.
        resourceMultiplier - the multiplier used to determine the amount of Resources this locality produces.
